Goal Representation: ['1. Find a clean cup and fill it with water.', '2. Place the cup with water in the freezer.']

behavior find_clean_cup(cup:item):
    body:
        achieve clean(cup)
        # Ensure the cup is clean

behavior fill_clean_cup_with_water(faucet:item, cup:item):
    body:
        achieve has_water(cup)
        # Ensure the clean cup is filled with water

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind faucet: item where:
            is_faucet(faucet)
        # Select a faucet
        foreach cup: item:
            if is_cup(cup) and not visited(cup):
                observe(cup, "Check if the cup is clean")
                # Check if the cup is clean
        bind clean_cup: item where:
            is_cup(clean_cup) and clean(clean_cup)
        # Select a clean cup
        fill_clean_cup_with_water(faucet, clean_cup)
